rules_text:
You may cast permanent spells as though they had flash.
During your second main phase, if you activate an ability with {T} in its activation cost, pay {Q} rather than tap that permanent. [i]({Q} is the untap symbol.)[/i]
notes:
!tokens Memory EIW
art4
At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, exile a card from your hand with a loop counter on it. Copy each card you own in exile with a loop counter on it. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

Sacrifice a land: Exile a card from your hand. It gains “At the beginning of your upkeep, copy this card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.” for as long as it remains exiled. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

Sacrifice a land: Exile a card from your hand with a loop counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
At the beginning of your end step, copy each card you own in exile with a loop counter on it. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.
